message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a fair offer considering the time pressure.
I understand the time pressure, but that offer wasn't fair to me. How about we split a little closer to the middle? This gives you a slight advantage still.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my counter-offer - it's closer to my original proposal, but gives you a bit more than your last one. Let's close this deal.
Alice, let's be realistic. The clock is ticking and we both lose if this fails.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
